name: Jose
content: I've had a great experience with Pocketpills. Staff has been very nice and orders are on time. Also the app is super easy to navigate. I look forward to keep using on using Pocketpills for my prescriptions.

name: Donald I.
content: Staff and submission was very good. However, Johnson’s had bragged about your pricing, however, it was not much better than my local pharmacy. I see that FIVE FREESTYLE FLAS SENSORS came to $104.99 (70 days). Can you check with my drug plan to see if I can submit 7 Sensors at a time and what would the unit cost be that you could get 7 for me? Thank you,

name: Eshaan
content: Very helpful, very accommodating. Thank you so much

name: Cynthia H.
content: Everyone i have dealt with has been very knowledgeable and helpful. Great first experience as i have just joined pocketpills.

name: Tammy W.
content: I wish you guys did nit raise your dispensing fee from 7 to 11.That is a lot. This is the same as Metro, not very much difference in savings. Who ever was texting me was very polite and nice.Could you do better on the dispensing fee??

name: Cherie
content: Such a convenient and pleasant service. I can appreciate its simplicity. The delivery was a lot quicker than expected.

name: Deborah
content: I truly appreciated the expedited experience however my question is what happens if I'm not home? Could someone just raid my package laying on my front porch?

name: Maegan B.
content: It was so easy to use and the doctor I spoke to was incredibly helpful!!

name: Craig D.
content: Impressed with the quick, professional service!

name: Natalia
content: My delivery did not make it and this place went above and beyond to ensure that another deceivers came even after hours. It was thoughtful and caring and I felt well taken care of. Thank you, team. This place is wonderful!

name: Jan G.
content: Very friendly and accommodating this is literally the 2nd company that i ever reviewed. they deserve the praise!

name: Jenny E.
content: Was very helpful and easy to use. App was a little confusing to begin with but as soon as an appointment was scheduled with a doctor it was very easy afterwards

name: Kristopher K.
content: Super user friendly experience. This is a modern solution that makes getting prescriptions very simple.

name: Robyn
content: Ordering was so easy! Loved how fast it came. But the address was entered incorrectly twice and was delivered to the wrong house down my street . (Fed ex not you guys)

name: Andre
content: Great experience ….. very fast …. Very knowledgeable.
